articles.title: Kyrgios pleads guilty to assault, has no conviction recorded - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: CANBERRA, Australia (AP) — Australian tennis star Nick Kyrgios apologized for shoving a former girlfriend to the ground two years ago after he escaped conviction Friday on a charge of common assault.
